name: tasktrove
description: TaskTrove is a self-hosted personal task and project management app with boards, lists, due dates, and tags in a straightforward interface.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Create lists within boards to represent workflow stages or task categories

features.title: Drag And Drop
features.description: Move tasks between lists and reorder priorities with intuitive drag-and-drop interactions

features.title: Due Date Tracking
features.description: Set deadlines for tasks and receive visual indicators for upcoming and overdue items

features.title: Tag System
features.description: Label tasks with custom tags for categorization, filtering, and quick identification

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find tasks across all boards using search and filter by tags, dates, or status
